title: How TO - Change Bullet Color of Lists

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content: How TO - Change Bullet Color of Lists

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to change bullet colors for lists with CSS. Change Bullet Color Adele Agnes Billy Bob Step 1) Add HTML: Create a basic list: Example
  • Adele
  • Agnes
  • Billy
  • Bob
Step 2) Add CSS: Use the ::marker selector to change the bullet color of a list item: Example li::marker { color: red; } ★ +1
